HomePage.title: Accelerate Your Workflow 10x with My Architecture
HomePage.description: You have successfully applied several advanced technologies to ensure high performance and ease of development in your newly created Next.js project. Your technology stack includes the following:

lang.title: Language
lang.description: Easily work with any language, and everything is enhanced.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: A theme manager that adapts to the system and improves work speed.

screen.title: Screen
screen.description: Automatically determines screen size. Enhances responsiveness and boosts speed by 3x.

class.title: Class Filter
class.description: This plugin scans your templates for class attributes containing Tailwind CSS classes and then automatically sorts these classes according to the recommended class order.

copy.title: Copy
copy.description: A powerful utility for copying text and images.

api.title: API
api.description: Supercharged Axios and React Query codes serve you. Also handles dynamic routing queries.
